Package com.petition.platform.models

Class AbstractPetition

java.lang.Object
com.petition.platform.models.AbstractPetition
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<AbstractPetition>
Direct Known Subclasses:
SimplePetition
@MappedSuperclass public class AbstractPetition extends Object implements Comparable<AbstractPetition>
Abstract class representing a generic petition.
